analyses.title: Demographic Analysis of Policyholders
analyses.context: Understand the demographic profile of insurance policyholders.

sub_analyses.title: Age Distribution
sub_analyses.why: Analyze the age distribution to understand the predominant age groups among policyholders.
answers: Age distribution histograms or summary statistics

sub_analyses.title: Sex Ratio
sub_analyses.why: Determine the distribution of policyholders by gender.

sub_analyses.title: Children Count Distribution
sub_analyses.why: Understand family size trends among policyholders by analyzing the number of dependents.
answers: Histogram or summary statistics of children

analyses.title: Lifestyle and Health Profile
analyses.context: Analyze the lifestyle choices and health profiles of policyholders.

sub_analyses.title: BMI Distribution
sub_analyses.why: Assess the BMI range and its distribution to evaluate general health and obesity trends.

sub_analyses.title: Smoking Status Distribution
sub_analyses.why: Determine the proportion of smokers and non-smokers among policyholders.
answers: Proportion or count by smoking status

analyses.title: Geographical Analysis
analyses.context: Evaluate the regional distribution of policyholders to support regional market strategies.

sub_analyses.title: Region Distribution
sub_analyses.why: Analyze the number of policyholders in each geographical region.

analyses.title: Insurance Charges Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze the variance and factors influencing insurance charges.

sub_analyses.title: Charges Distribution
sub_analyses.why: Understand the distribution of charges to identify outliers or trends.

sub_analyses.title: Charges by Age Group
sub_analyses.why: Investigate how insurance charges differ across age groups.

sub_analyses.title: Charges by Smoking Status
sub_analyses.why: Compare the insurance charges between smokers and non-smokers.

sub_analyses.title: Charges by Region
sub_analyses.why: Analyze regional variations in insurance charges.

sub_analyses.title: Charges by BMI
sub_analyses.why: Determine the influence of BMI on insurance charges.
answers: Scatter plot or correlation between BMI and charges

analyses.title: Integrated Insights Analysis
analyses.context: Combine multiple factors to potentially derive deeper insights into insurance charges.

sub_analyses.title: Multi-Factor Charges Analysis
sub_analyses.why: Evaluate how multiple demographic and lifestyle factors affect insurance charges.
answers: Multivariate analysis of charges, age, BMI, sex, smoker, and region
